page.title: 04South Cliff Golf Course
page.content: People like to play golf on their holidays. Scarborough has two golf courses and one of them,{South Cliff,} is in this area. Golf is a very relaxing game and the South Cliff course is set in beautiful coastal scenery. You can become a member for one hundred pounds. This entitles you to use the club facilities and to play whenever you want, provided there is no tournament on. Non-members must pay a green fee of seven pounds per round. In the large clubhouse there is a ladies and gentlemen's locker room with showers. There is a special ladies lounge and a bar called {The {Nineteenth Hole.}There is also a T.V. room and patio and a dining room offering a choice of meals and snacks. The club has a professional player who gives lessons and sells equipment. It also has five green-keepers.
